trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows text box control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle de caixa de texto do Windows.

trans-unit.source: With the TextBox control, the user can enter text in an application.
trans-unit.target: Com o controle de caixa de texto, o usuário pode inserir texto em um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows text box control, including multiline editing and password character masking.
trans-unit.target: Este controle tem funcionalidade adicional que não foi encontrada no padrão Windows controle caixa de texto, incluindo a edição de várias linhas e mascaramento de caracteres de senha.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a TextBox control is used to display, or accept as input, a single line of text.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um controle de caixa de texto é usado para exibir ou aceitar como entrada, uma única linha de texto.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> properties to enable multiple lines of text to be displayed or entered.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>Propriedades para permitir várias linhas de texto a ser exibido ou inserido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> properties to `true` to enable greater text manipulation in a multiline TextBox control.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>propriedades `true` para permitir maior manipulação de texto em um controle de caixa de texto de várias linhas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property to `true` to adjust the height of the TextBox control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Você deve definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>propriedade `true` para ajustar a altura do controle TextBox.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can adjust the height by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode ajustar a altura, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can limit the amount of text entered into a TextBox control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to a specific number of characters.
trans-unit.target: Você pode limitar a quantidade de texto inserido em um controle de caixa de texto, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>propriedade como um número específico de caracteres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: TextBox controls can also be used to accept passwords and other sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: Controles de caixa de texto também podem ser usados para aceitar as senhas e outras informações confidenciais.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property to mask characters entered in a single-line version of the control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>propriedade a ser inserido em uma versão de linha única do controle de caracteres de máscara.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to enable the user to type only uppercase, only lowercase, or a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters into the TextBox control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>propriedade para permitir que o usuário digitar apenas letras maiusculas, letras minúsculas apenas, ou uma combinação de caracteres maiusculos e minúsculos em controle TextBox.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>

trans-unit.source: To scroll the contents of the TextBox until the cursor (caret) is within the visible region of the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para rolar o conteúdo da caixa de texto até que o cursor (cursor) está dentro da região visível do controle, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a range of text in the text box, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar um intervalo de texto na caixa de texto, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: To restrict text from being entered in a TextBox control, you can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event in order to validate each character entered in the control.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o texto que está sendo inserido em um controle de caixa de texto, você pode criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>evento para validar cada caractere digitado no controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: You can also restrict all entry of data in a TextBox control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode restringir todas as entrada de dados em um controle de caixa de texto, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Most of the functionality of the TextBox control is inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A maioria da funcionalidade do controle TextBox é herdada da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>classe</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> de

trans-unit.source: > > Using the TextBox control with visual styles enabled will cause the incorrect handling of surrogate fonts.
trans-unit.target: >> Usando o controle de caixa de texto com estilos visuais habilitados fará com que o tratamento incorreto de fontes de substitutos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The parent container control defines the color and font settings for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: O controle do contêiner pai define as configurações de fonte e de cor para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing ENTER in a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control creates a new line of text in the control or activates the default button for the form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se pressionar ENTER em um multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle cria uma nova linha de texto no controle ou ativa o botão padrão para o formulário.

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `false`, the user must press CTRL+ENTER to create a new line in a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor dessa propriedade é `false`, o usuário deve pressionar CTRL + ENTER para criar uma nova linha em um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If there is no default button for the form, the ENTER key will always create a new line of text in the control, regardless of the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum botão padrão para o formulário, a tecla ENTER sempre criará uma nova linha de texto no controle, independentemente do valor dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ENTER key creates a new line of text in a multiline version of the control; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the ENTER key activates the default button for the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a tecla ENTER cria uma nova linha de texto em uma versão de várias linhas do controle; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a tecla ENTER ativa o botão padrão para o formulário.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> to use when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomSource" name="CustomSource" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um personalizado <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"> </xref> para serem usados quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>estiver definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomSource" name="CustomSource" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>

trans-unit.source: Use the AutoCompleteCustomSource, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: Use o AutoCompleteCustomSource <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>as propriedades para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>que preenche automaticamente cadeias de caracteres de entrada, comparando o prefixo que está sendo inserido para os prefixos de todas as cadeias de caracteres em uma fonte de manutenção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controles no qual URLs, endereços, nomes de arquivos ou comandos serão frequentemente inseridos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The use of the AutoCompleteCustomSource property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use AutoCompleteCustomSource.
trans-unit.target: O uso da propriedade AutoCompleteCustomSource é opcional, mas você deve definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>propriedade `CustomSource` para usar AutoCompleteCustomSource.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>propriedades juntas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O sistema operacional pode limitar o número de cadeias de caracteres personalizadas que ele pode exibir ao mesmo tempo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> to use with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> to use with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an option that controls how automatic completion works for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma opção que controla como o preenchimento automático funciona para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, AutoCompleteMode, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, AutoCompleteMode, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>as propriedades para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>que preenche automaticamente cadeias de caracteres de entrada, comparando o prefixo que está sendo inserido para os prefixos de todas as cadeias de caracteres em uma fonte de manutenção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controles no qual URLs, endereços, nomes de arquivos ou comandos serão frequentemente inseridos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O uso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>propriedade é opcional, mas você deve definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>propriedade `CustomSource` para usar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must use the AutoCompleteMode and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar o AutoCompleteMode e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>propriedades juntas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O sistema operacional pode limitar o número de cadeias de caracteres personalizadas que ele pode exibir ao mesmo tempo.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The following are the values.
trans-unit.target: A seguir estão os valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref> Appends the remainder of the most likely candidate string to the existing characters, highlighting the appended characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>Anexa o restante da cadeia de caracteres mais provável candidato para os caracteres existentes, realçando os caracteres acrescentados.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref> Displays the auxiliary drop-down list associated with the edit control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>Exibe a lista suspensa auxiliar associada ao controle de edição.

trans-unit.source: This drop-down is populated with one or more suggested completion strings.
trans-unit.target: Essa lista suspensa é preenchida com um ou mais cadeias de caracteres de preenchimento sugeridas.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref> Appends both <xref uid="langword_csharp_Suggest" name="Suggest" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Append" name="Append" href=""></xref> options.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>Acrescenta ambos <xref uid="langword_csharp_Suggest" name="Suggest" href=""> </xref> e <xref uid="langword_csharp_Append" name="Append" href=""> </xref> opções.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref> Disables automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>Desabilita o preenchimento automático.

trans-unit.source: This is the default.
trans-unit.target: Esse é o padrão.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the source of complete strings used for automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica a origem de strings completas usadas para o preenchimento automático.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and AutoCompleteSource properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>e as propriedades AutoCompleteSource para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>que preenche automaticamente cadeias de caracteres de entrada, comparando o prefixo que está sendo inserido para os prefixos de todas as cadeias de caracteres em uma fonte de manutenção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controles no qual URLs, endereços, nomes de arquivos ou comandos serão frequentemente inseridos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the AutoCompleteSource property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O uso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>propriedade é opcional, mas você deve definir a propriedade AutoCompleteSource como `CustomSource` para usar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and AutoCompleteSource properties together.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>e propriedades AutoCompleteSource.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > AutoCompleteSource does not work on multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > AutoCompleteSource não funciona em várias linhas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that can be displayed at once.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O sistema operacional pode limitar o número de cadeias de caracteres personalizadas que podem ser exibidas ao mesmo tempo.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The options are <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllSystemSources" name="AllSystemSources" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllUrl" name="AllUrl" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_FileSystem" name="FileSystem" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_HistoryList" name="HistoryList" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_RecentlyUsedList" name="RecentlyUsedList" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomSource" name="CustomSource" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The options are <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllSystemSources" name="AllSystemSources" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllUrl" name="AllUrl" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_FileSystem" name="FileSystem" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_HistoryList" name="HistoryList" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_RecentlyUsedList" name="RecentlyUsedList" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomSource" name="CustomSource" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control modifies the case of characters as they are typed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle modifica o caso de caracteres quando eles são digitados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the CharacterCasing property to change the case of characters as required by your application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a propriedade CharacterCasing para alterar o caso de caracteres conforme exigido pelo seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could change the case of all characters entered in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control used for password entry to uppercase or lowercase to enforce a policy for passwords.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode alterar o caso de todos os caracteres inseridos em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controle usado para entrada de senha em maiusculas ou minúsculas para impor uma política de senhas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CharacterCasing"></xref> enumeration values that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control modifies the case of characters.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CharacterCasing"> </xref> valores de enumeração que especifica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle modifica o caso de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_CharacterCasing.Normal" name="CharacterCasing.Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_CharacterCasing.Normal" name="CharacterCasing.Normal" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que não está dentro do intervalo de valores válidos para a enumeração foi atribuído à propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os parâmetros de criação necessária quando a alça de controle é criada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> que contém os parâmetros de criação necessária quando o identificador para o controle é criado.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca o protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is an input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada ou uma chave especial que requer pré-processamento.

trans-unit.source: The IsInputKey method returns `true` when `keyData` includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O método IsInputKey retorna `true` quando `keyData` inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>valor e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: One of the key's values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores da chave.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is an input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se este é um multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> does not work on multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>não funciona em várias linhas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the font is changed, any indentation that you have defined does not appear.
trans-unit.target: Quando a fonte é alterada, qualquer recuo que você definiu não aparecerá.

trans-unit.source: To get indentation, set Multiline to `true` and override WM_SETFONT without calling the base class so that SETMARGINS is not called.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o recuo, definir várias linhas `true` e substituir WM_SETFONT sem chamar a classe base para que SETMARGINS não seja chamado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle for um multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnBackColorChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnBackColorChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnFontChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnFontChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: When the user selects text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, the control saves the selection.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário seleciona o texto em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controle, o controle salva a seleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control gets focus, the selection is the same as when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controle obtém foco, a seleção é o mesmo que quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>perde o foco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> gets focus for the first time, the entire text is selected.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>obtém foco pela primeira vez, todo o texto é selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnGotFocus method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método AoReceberFoco também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleDestroyed*> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleDestroyed*>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleDestroyed*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: The OnHandleDestroyed method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnHandleDestroyed também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlignChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlignChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnTextAlignChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnTextAlignChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character used to mask characters of a password in a single-line <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caractere usado para caracteres de máscara de uma senha em uma única linha <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> property has precedence over the PasswordChar property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>propriedade tem precedência sobre a propriedade PasswordChar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by PasswordChar is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>é definido como `true`, o caractere de senha padrão do sistema é usado e qualquer caractere definido por PasswordChar é ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the PasswordChar property is set, cut and copy actions in the control using the keyboard cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade PasswordChar é definida, as ações de recortar e copiar no controle usando o teclado não podem ser executadas.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in password mode because PasswordChar, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>está em modo de senha porque PasswordChar, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>é `true`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>está no modo restrito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is disabled, but the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is cached so that it can be restored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> ever becomes unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: Nesse modo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>é desabilitada, mas atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>é armazenado em cache para que ele possa ser restaurado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>fica irrestrito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is a common scenario.
trans-unit.target: Alternando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>é um cenário comum.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>é sombreado, enquanto o controle está no modo restrito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: From the designer perspective, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> value shown is the actual value.
trans-unit.target: Da perspectiva do designer, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>valor exibido é o valor real.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: The character used to mask characters entered in a single-line <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O caractere usado para caracteres de máscara inseridos em uma única linha <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Set the value of this property to 0 (character value) if you do not want the control to mask characters as they are typed.
trans-unit.target: Defina o valor dessa propriedade como 0 (valor de caractere) se você não desejar que o controle para caracteres de máscara quando eles são digitados.

trans-unit.source: Equals 0 (character value) by default.
trans-unit.target: É igual a 0 (valor de caractere) por padrão.

trans-unit.source: Sets the selected text to the specified text without clearing the undo buffer.
trans-unit.target: Define o texto selecionado para o texto especificado sem limpar o buffer de desfazer.

trans-unit.source: Unlike setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>, Paste does not affect the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de configuração <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>, colar não afeta a área de transferência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to replace.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: New in 4.6.1.
trans-unit.target: Novo no 4.6.1.

trans-unit.source: In previous versions, the Ctrl-A shortcut key in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> failed to select all text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> properties were both set to `true.`.
trans-unit.target: Nas versões anteriores, a tecla de atalho de Ctrl-A em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>Falha ao selecionar todo o texto quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>propriedades foram definidas como `true.`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This method enables the Ctrl-A shortcut key to select all text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> properties are both set to `true.` Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.0 through 4.6 can take advantage of this method by adding the following to the `<runtime>` section of the app.config file: ```xml <AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" /> ``` Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.6.1 or newer can opt out of this behavior by adding the following to the `<runtime>` section of the app.config file: ```xml <AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=true" /> ``` > [!NOTE] > If the app.config file already contains an `AppContextSwitchOverrides` key, merge the new key value into the existing key.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que a tecla de atalho Ctrl-A para selecionar todo o texto quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>propriedades são definidas como `true.` aplicativos destinados a versões do .NET Framework 4.0 a 4.6 podem tirar vantagem desse método, adicionando o seguinte para o `<runtime>` seção do arquivo App. config: ```xml <AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" /> ``` aplicativos destinados a versões do .NET Framework 4.6.1 ou mais recente podem desativar esse comportamento adicionando o seguinte para o `<runtime>` seção do arquivo App. config : ```xml <AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=true" /> ``` > [!NOTE] > Se o arquivo App. config já contém um `AppContextSwitchOverrides` chave, o novo valor de chave de mesclagem para a chave existente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `<AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "oldKey=oldValue;Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" />`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `<AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "oldKey=oldValue;Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" />`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passado por referência que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the shortcut key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a tecla de atalho para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the command key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave do comando foi processada pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which scroll bars should appear in a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define que as barras de rolagem deve aparecer em um multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Horizontal scroll bars will not be shown if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> property is set to `true`, regardless of the value of the ScrollBars property.
trans-unit.target: Barras de rolagem horizontal não serão exibidas se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>está definida como `true`, independentemente do valor da propriedade ScrollBars.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref> enumeration values that indicates whether a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control appears with no scroll bars, a horizontal scroll bar, a vertical scroll bar, or both.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref> valores de enumeração que indica se um multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle aparece com nenhuma barra de rolagem, uma barra de rolagem horizontal, uma barra de rolagem vertical ou ambos.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScrollBars.None" name="ScrollBars.None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScrollBars.None" name="ScrollBars.None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que não está dentro do intervalo de valores válidos para a enumeração foi atribuído à propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto associado a este controle.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: O texto associado a este controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how text is aligned in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento do texto em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> to match the layout of text on your form.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para alinhar o texto dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>para corresponder ao layout do texto do formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, if your controls are all located on the right side of the form, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A> property to `HorizontalAlignment.Right`, and the text will be aligned with the right side of the control instead of the default left alignment.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se os controles estão localizados no lado direito do formulário, você pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A>propriedade `HorizontalAlignment.Right`, e o texto será alinhado com o lado direito do controle, em vez do alinhamento à esquerda do padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> enumeration values that specifies how text is aligned in the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> valores de enumeração que especifica como o texto é alinhado no controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlignment.Left" name="HorizontalAlignment.Left" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlignment.Left" name="HorizontalAlignment.Left" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que não está dentro do intervalo de valores válidos para a enumeração foi atribuído à propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign*>propriedade foi alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control should appear as the default password character.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o texto de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle deve aparecer como o caractere de senha padrão.

trans-unit.source: The UseSystemPasswordChar property has precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade UseSystemPasswordChar tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Whenever the UseSystemPasswordChar is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que o UseSystemPasswordChar é definido como `true`, o caractere de senha padrão do sistema é usado e qualquer caractere definido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>será ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in password mode because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>, UseSystemPasswordChar, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>está em modo de senha porque <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>, UseSystemPasswordChar, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>é `true`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>está no modo restrito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is disabled, but the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is cached so that it can be restored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> ever becomes unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: Nesse modo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>é desabilitada, mas atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>é armazenado em cache para que ele possa ser restaurado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>fica irrestrito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is a common scenario.
trans-unit.target: Alternando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>é um cenário comum.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>é sombreado, enquanto o controle está no modo restrito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: From the designer perspective, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> value shown is the actual value.
trans-unit.target: Da perspectiva do designer, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>valor exibido é o valor real.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control should appear as the default password character; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o texto a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle deve aparecer como a senha padrão do caractere; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: A Windows Message object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de mensagem do Windows.
